column9: I use Lactinex for treating cold sores.  The minute I feel one coming on I take some.  If I take it at night usually the beginning of the cold sore is gone by the next morning.  You have to ask the pharmacist to look in their refrigerator.  Been taking it for years.  Miracle med!

robyn5049, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Caregiver)
column9: This OTC medication is kept in the cooler at the drug stores, so you have to ask for it.  About one a year, my young son gets a fever blister.  Now, when he starts to feel the onset of one, the very early onset, I can give him this medicine and the fever blister never comes out, it never even gets red.  It stops it in its tracks immediately.
I use Lactinex at the first sign of a cold sore and it reduces the duration AND severity by HALF. I see more results from Lactinex than I have by trying L-Lysine. I'm a believer!

column2: 65-74 Female
column9: A musician told me a long time ago about using Lactinex tablets to fight cold sores.  It has proven very effective, especially if taken at the first sign of a cold sore.  The tablets seem to be more effective than the granules.
